price: El pueblo de Noé [también fue castigado] porque era gente perversa.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
